document_data.mainbody:
Pale Oak was a type of enchanted staff wielded by the most devote members of the Church of Silvanus.
Each of the Pale Oak staves was imbued with the divine magics of Silvanus, the Oak Father to be wielded by the Faithwardens, the Silvanite defenders of nature. The staves allowed their wielders to cast the Faithwardens vines spell. The wielders were also unaffected by the spell and could move freely through the summoned plant growth.
In the , Kagha of the Emerald Grove in the Western Heartlands could reward helpers to the Groves cause with a Pale Oak.
